version_description: Today Widget (iOS8): the widget briefly shows some details of the biggest seismic event occurred in your country over the last 24 hours. The widget is localized in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Greek.
- Russian, Portuguese, Dutch, Romanian and Hungarian localizations

- include Apple Watch support
- support for US States and Canadian provinces / territories in push notification filters

- watchOS2 version (watchOS1 no longer supported)
- simplified Chinese localization
- minor bug fixes

- minor bug fixes and improvements
